Welcome! ðŸ‘‹

This website serves as a hub of data science notes, cool stuff I find and some useful code snippets. Feel free to browse! 


Who am I?
===========

Existential thoughts aside, my name is Sophie (unsurprisingly ðŸ˜‰) and I drink a lot of coffee. I have a BSc in Computer Science, and work as a Data Scientist. I love trying to solve near impossible challenges and using werid data. 

You can find me at the following:
